p: The optimized method was validated using the best conditions for the extraction of the main components from the essential oil of O. basilicum. The validation of the analysis of linalool and estragole extracted by combined ultrasound and hydrodistillation techniques and their analysis by (GC-FID) was based on the following parameters: selectivity, linearity, limit of detection (LOD), limit of quantification (LOQ), accuracy (recovery assays), and precision (repeatability).
